Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Northbound Reroute near 130th/Vernon
ShortDescription: Northbound 34 South Michigan buses are rerouted via Ellis, 133rd, 134th, Indiana, 130th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage nr 130th/Vernon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Ellis, 133rd, 134th, Indiana, 130th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 130th/Vernon.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
